#summary Instructions on how to compile and JNAerator from sources
#sidebar sidebar


  # Checkout the latest sources (you'll need SVN installed) : 
{{{ 
svn co http://jnaerator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk jnaerator
cd jnaerator
}}}

  # Install Maven
  # Install jnaerator-parent project
{{{
mvn install
}}}
  # Run Maven on jnaerator-runtime
{{{
cd jnaerator-runtime
mvn clean install
cd ..
}}}
  # Run Maven on jnaerator
{{{
cd jnaerator
mvn clean install
cd ..
}}}
